From psychological games to complex conspiracies, these six new thrillers deliver the tension and excitement that fans of Sleeping Dogs crave. html:
08 Nov 2024

6 New Thriller Novels for Fans of Sleeping Dogs

If you were captivated by the pulse-pounding intensity and intricate twists of Sleeping Dogs, you’re in for a treat. Thrillers that keep you on the edge of your seat are hard to beat, and there’s a whole new crop of novels ready to grip you with high-stakes mysteries, dark secrets, and suspense that’ll make you lose track of time. From psychological games to complex conspiracies, these six new thrillers deliver the tension and excitement that fans of Sleeping Dogs crave.

In Still Waters

by Natalie Shpet

Release Date: October 3 2024

Years ago, in a high school in the quiet town of Austin, Minnesota, a tragic incident occurred. A classmate attacked a boy, slashing his face with a sharp object and leaving a deep scar on his cheek. Years later, a series of horrific murders shakes the peaceful community. One by one, seemingly unconnected individuals fall victim to a mysterious…

Buy on Amazon

Sino-American war (Brad Johnson: Ace of Aces Book 8)

by Daniel Hutmacher

Release Date: October 16 2024

As the war rages, Brad continues the fight. Can the Allies get control of the air, or will China drive them off Mindanao? President Havens is only the second president to be sworn on without winning an election. Will he fight, or will he surrender? Grab your copy of volume eight of the Sino-American War and find out.

Buy on Amazon

The Shudder

by Guney Sokullu

Release Date: October 9 2024

In “The Shudder,” follow the gripping journey of Sandra Lija, an ambitious and ruthless dancer whose drive to succeed knows no bounds. The corrupting power of ambition, the struggle to reconcile light and dark sides of oneself. Sandra has to confront the person she has avoided becoming.

Buy on Amazon

The Things We Hide

by Vanessa Garbin

Release Date: October 13 2024

THE THINGS WE HIDE is a riveting domestic thriller packed with shocking twists that will keep you on the edge of your seat. It is the ninth standalone novel by Australian writing sensation Vanessa Garbin.

Buy on Amazon

The Nurse’s Mistake

by Daniel Hurst

Release Date: November 5 2024

A completely addictive psychological thriller from the number one bestselling author of The Doctor’s Wife. If you love Freida McFadden, John Marrs and T.M. Logan then The Nurse’s Mistake will have you hooked until the final, jaw-dropping ending!

Buy on Amazon

Taken in the Cold (Agent Tori Hunter Book 7)

by Roger Stelljes

Release Date: November 1 2024

“Make sure you wrap up warm for school, honey. A blizzard is on the way.” Ten-year-old Teddy rolls his eyes at his mother. But then he hears a bang… By the time police arrive, Teddy’s mother is dead. His open school backpack is strewn across the hallway. And Teddy is nowhere to be found.

Buy on Amazon
